title: Honorable Governor paid homage to Mahatma Gandhi and paid silent tribute to the martyrs of the Indian freedom struggle.

content: Hon’ble Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee paid respectful homage on the death anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi.
title: Hon’ble Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee paid respectful homage on the death anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi.

content: Hon’ble Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee wished all on the occasion of Sampriti Divas.
